channel.title: Npc "Click here to continue" is not working, Need some help
channel.description:
Alright, You know when your talking to a npc and it says "Click here to continue"? Yeh well mine doesn't work... It just changes to "Please wait..." and never goes away unless I walk away from the npc. Can anyone help me with this? Or at least point me to where them options are held so I can sort it out?
Its a 508 btw.
